pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Continual Reassessment Method for Phase I Dose- Escalation Trials // Implements a wide variety of one- and two- parameter Bayesian CRM designs. The program can run interactively, allowing the user to enter outcomes after each cohort has been recruited, or via simulation to assess operating characteristics. See Sweeting et al. (2013): doi:10.18637/jss.v054.i13.
